articles.title: UPI to account for 90% of retail digital payments by 2026-27: PwC India report - Economic Times
articles.description: The Indian digital payments market saw steady growth at a CAGR of 50 per cent (volume-wise) and is expected to reach 411 billion transactions in FY 2026-27 from 103 billion in FY 2022-23, the report said.
